text: Los Hermanos Zuleta (Spanish for The Zuleta Brothers) are a renowned vallenato musical group[ Los Hermanos Zuleta], All Music, accessed September 2010 that won the Latin Grammy Awards of 2006. Their name refers to the brothers Emiliano Alcides Zuleta and Tomás Alfonso Zuleta, who founded the group and are sons of Emiliano Zuleta, writer of the song La Gota Fría. ==References== Category:Vallenato musical groups Category:Latin Grammy Award winners
title: Los Hermanos Zuleta
